trans-unit.source: Manipulation
trans-unit.target: Manipulation

trans-unit.source: Data Transformation / Manipulation
trans-unit.target: Data Transformation / Manipulation

trans-unit.source: The modules in this section provide tools that are used to prepare data for machine learning.
trans-unit.target: The modules in this section provide tools that are used to prepare data for machine learning.

trans-unit.source: Data Manipulation for Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Data Manipulation for Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning Studio supports most core data management tasks that are required for preparing data for use in a machine learning model, including:
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning Studio supports most core data management tasks that are required for preparing data for use in a machine learning model, including:

trans-unit.source: Merging datasets
trans-unit.target: Merging datasets

trans-unit.source: Grouping and summarizing data
trans-unit.target: Grouping and summarizing data

trans-unit.source: Converting values to another type
trans-unit.target: Converting values to another type

trans-unit.source: Checking for missing values and replacing them with appropriate values
trans-unit.target: Checking for missing values and replacing them with appropriate values

trans-unit.source: Flagging columns as features (for example, labels)
trans-unit.target: Flagging columns as features (for example, labels)

trans-unit.source: Most of the modules in this section are designed to work with discrete or categorical data.
trans-unit.target: Most of the modules in this section are designed to work with discrete or categorical data.

trans-unit.source: If you need to scale numbers, normalize data, or put numerical values into bins, use the tools in the <link xlink:href="345c5ed4-4dd6-4998-9773-6ca0e00e6946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Scale and Reduce</link> section.
trans-unit.target: If you need to scale numbers, normalize data, or put numerical values into bins, use the tools in the <link xlink:href="345c5ed4-4dd6-4998-9773-6ca0e00e6946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Scale and Reduce</link> section.

trans-unit.source: If you need to perform calculations on numeric data fields or generate commonly used statistics, see the modules in the <link xlink:href="8a248cba-24aa-4779-aad6-35d73a0a2340" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Stats and Numbers</link> section.
trans-unit.target: If you need to perform calculations on numeric data fields or generate commonly used statistics, see the modules in the <link xlink:href="8a248cba-24aa-4779-aad6-35d73a0a2340" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Stats and Numbers</link> section.

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: For examples of how to work with complex data in machine learning experiments, see these samples in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/machine-learning/models/</linkUri></externalLink>:
trans-unit.target: For examples of how to work with complex data in machine learning experiments, see these samples in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/machine-learning/models/</linkUri></externalLink>:

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Data Processing and Analysis</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525733</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates key tools and processes.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Data Processing and Analysis</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525733</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates key tools and processes.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample illustrates how to partition datasets and apply special processing to each partition.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample illustrates how to partition datasets and apply special processing to each partition.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the process of preparing data for predictive analytics, see these resources:
trans-unit.target: For additional information about the process of preparing data for predictive analytics, see these resources:

trans-unit.source: Blog: <externalLink><linkText>The Cloud Data Science Process</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.technet.com/b/machinelearning/archive/2015/04/15/the-cloud-data-science-process.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: Blog: <externalLink><linkText>The Cloud Data Science Process</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.technet.com/b/machinelearning/archive/2015/04/15/the-cloud-data-science-process.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: List of Modules
trans-unit.target: List of Modules

trans-unit.source: The Data Transformation/Manipulation category includes the following modules:
trans-unit.target: The Data Transformation/Manipulation category includes the following modules:

trans-unit.source: Module
trans-unit.target: Module

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of columns from one dataset to another
trans-unit.target: Adds a set of columns from one dataset to another

trans-unit.source: Appends a set of rows from an input dataset to the end of another dataset
trans-unit.target: Appends a set of rows from an input dataset to the end of another dataset

trans-unit.source: Runs a SQLite query on input datasets to transform the data
trans-unit.target: Runs a SQLite query on input datasets to transform the data

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to handle the values missing from a dataset
trans-unit.target: Specifies how to handle the values missing from a dataset

trans-unit.source: Groups data from multiple categories into a new category
trans-unit.target: Groups data from multiple categories into a new category

trans-unit.source: Converts categorical values in columns to indicator values
trans-unit.target: Converts categorical values in columns to indicator values

trans-unit.source: Joins two datasets
trans-unit.target: Joins two datasets

trans-unit.source: Edits metadata associated with columns in a dataset
trans-unit.target: Edits metadata associated with columns in a dataset

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to handle values that are missing from a dataset
trans-unit.target: Specifies how to handle values that are missing from a dataset

trans-unit.source: Selects columns to include or exclude from a dataset in an operation
trans-unit.target: Selects columns to include or exclude from a dataset in an operation

trans-unit.source: Removes the duplicate rows from a dataset
trans-unit.target: Removes the duplicate rows from a dataset

trans-unit.source: Increases the number of low incidence examples in a dataset using synthetic minority oversampling
trans-unit.target: Increases the number of low incidence examples in a dataset using synthetic minority oversampling
